## Installation

```bash
# NPM
npm install nuxt-supabase-team-auth@{{ tag_name }}

# PNPM  
pnpm add nuxt-supabase-team-auth@{{ tag_name }}

# Yarn
yarn add nuxt-supabase-team-auth@{{ tag_name }}
```
